text:
HubSpot `<form>` element `id` attributes will be changing to be unique to prevent invalid html and bugs that can occur as a result of expecting them to be unique. A CSS class and data-form-id are safe to target for CSS and JS. If you previously targeted form id attribute you will want toswitch selectors. See announcement for details.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/form-element-id-attribute-is-being-changed-to-be-more-unique>
Dang what took so long hahahaâ€¦ :slightly_smiling_face:
